titleStmt.title: A declaration wherein is full satisfaction given concerning Sir Edward Deering: with the just vindication of him from the scandals cast upon him by malignants, and the reasons of his return. With a true relation of the Scots proceedings about the surrendring of Newcastle.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Coe according to order,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 14"; the 4 in imprint date is crossed out and altered to 1643.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
